mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_DEADLINE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESSION , A.PROJECT_STATUS , A.PROJECT_COMPLETED_DATE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS_STATUS_CODE , C.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY B ON (A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON(B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND B.ROLE_NO = 8

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_DEADLINE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESSION , A.PROJECT_STATUS , A.PROJECT_COMPLETED_DATE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS_STATUS_CODE , C.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY B ON (A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON(B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.PROJECT_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT D.PROJECT_NO FROM TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY D WHERE D.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND D.ROLE_NO != 8 ) AND B.ROLE_NO = 8 ORDER BY A.PROJECT_NO
